frqParts.text: Contemporary life is marked by controversy. Choose a controversial local, national, or global issue with which you are familiar. Within this issue, consider any opposing positions, solutions, and compromises. Write an essay that argues your position on this controversy. In your response you should do the following: Respond to the prompt with a thesis that presents a defensible position. Provide evidence to support your line of reasoning. Explain how the evidence supports your line of reasoning. Use appropriate grammar and punctuation in communicating your argument.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
